Class WordCountMap

java.lang.Object
WordCountMap
public class WordCountMap extends Object
WordCountMap provides the mapping of words and their occurrences from an Array of words.

  • Method Details

    • addListOfWords

      public void addListOfWords(ArrayList<String> listOfWords)
      Calls AddWord on ArrayList of Strings.
      Parameters:
      listOfWords - an ArrayList of words

    • addWord

      public void addWord(String wordToAdd)
      Check to see if word is in list. If it is, increment count. If not, add word and count 1.
      Parameters:
      wordToAdd - an individual word to add.

    • displayTop20

      public void displayTop20()
      Displays the top 20 words counted in descending order to the console.

    • returnTop20

      public LinkedHashMap<String,Integer> returnTop20()
      Provides a top 20 list without printing to the console.
      Returns:
      a LinkedHashMap of String, Integer.

    • displayTopX

      public void displayTopX(int numberToDisplay)
      Displays a list of words to the console.
      Parameters:
      numberToDisplay - the number of words to display.

    • getObservableWordCountList

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<WordCount> getObservableWordCountList(LinkedHashMap<String,Integer> top20)
      Sorts the WordCount in descending order into a ObservableList
      Parameters:
      top20 - a sorted hashmap of words and their number of occurrences
      Returns:
      an ObservableList of the hashmap that JavaFX can read.

    • clearMap

      public void clearMap()
      Resets the count map without destroying the instance of the class.
